full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/7/2023 TRANSLATION OF BIRTH CERTIFICATE REPUBLIC OF HONDURAS FIRST CLASS FIFTY CENTS 1980-1983 No: 0075863 C.ERTIFICATION The Undersigned, Municipal Secretary and on charge of Civil Registry of this city, CERTIFIES: that on Folio No 230 of the original Book of Birth No 4, pertaining to the year of eighteen hundred ninety nine (1899) that it is recorded in this Municipality and literally reads: TARCILA ISIDRA.- at La Ceiba, on the Twenty second of May of Eighteen hundred ninety nine. - Personally appeared Mr. MANUEL J. ROMERO, whom he declared that in this Port and at his own home, on the FIFTEENTH COURRENT ( MAY 15, 1899) ,at 11A.M. was born a girld named: TARCILA ISIDRA natural daughter of declarant party and FRANCISCA LANZA, Paternal Grandparents: Pedro Romero and Maria Josefa Palma.- - Mater- nal Grandparents: Jesus Lanza and Gertrudis Galindo de Lanza.- - Were Witnesses and signed: Manuel J. Romero.- Quintin Gaitan. - Gregorio Castro.- Sealed. J. Amaya.- - In accordance with its original. - The present Act was issued at La Ceiba, January 9th, 1980 Signature: ILLEGIBLE Signature: ILLEGIBLE KAMEL JOSE DANIEL PINEL E. MUNICIAPL SECRETARY MAYOR Seal: MUNICIPALITY OF LA CEIBA Seal: MUNICIPAL OFFICE HONDURAS. C.A LA CEIBA HONDURAS. C.A. I, Juana L. Fonarov, being duly qualified to translate from Spanish into the English language, certify this to be a correct translation of the original to the best of my knowledge. TRANSLATOR Witness my hand and official seal, this 20th day of May of 1987, in the city of Miami, State of Florida, U.S.A. NOTARY PUBLIC NOTARY PUBLIC STATE OF FLORIDA NY COMMISSION EXP. AUG 28,1989 BONDED THRU GENERAL INS. UND.
